title: Featherfall Potion
summaries: The Featherfall Potion is a buff potion which grants the Featherfall buff when consumed. The buff reduces the player's fall speed and gravity by 1/3, allowing them to jump higher than normal. This lasts for 10 minutes(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 5 minutes(Old-gen console and 3DS versions), but can be canceled at any time by right-clicking the icon ([img:Desktop version]), by selecting the icon using Cycle Next/Previous Buff and then pressing Remove Buff ([img:Console version]), by selecting the icon and canceling it in the equipment menu ([img:Old-gen console version]), by double-tapping the buff icon ([img:Mobile version]), or by canceling the buff from the buffs screen ([img:Nintendo 3DS version]).

The player can hold the ▼ Down key to cancel the effects or the ▲ Up key to further reduce fall speed and gravity to 90%. While under the effects of both Featherfall Potion and Gravitation Potion, holding the ▲ Up key will make the player fall up at normal speed. The player will fall up at a slowed speed when holding no direction.

The effects of the Featherfall Potion can also be used to jump higher. By holding ▲ Up, grappling a platform above you, and releasing the grapple before it is complete, one may achieve jumping heights of several hundred blocks. You can also jump higher in a minecart by holding ▲ Up to gain some more height than if you jumped while under the effect.
<linked>Fall damage</linked> is also negated, even when falling normally. It is worth noting that the Featherfall Potion also increases the distance players are knocked back when hit by an attack.
